review: I bought this for my parents, who only have Amazon Prime (didn't want to use any other features). They had tried to watch free streaming movies by plugging a laptop into the tv with an HDMI cord, and the buffering ruined all movies! Slowest loading ever, no matter how we changed the loading settings on the computer. The Fire stick totally solved this issue. The sound quality is a little different on the tv, but it is great to get through a movie without a 20 second pause every 5-10 minutes. This is the only feature I can speak to, but it is great and we know it's good quality because it's Amazon. Also, I ordered during the holiday backup, and it arrived a week or so early!One thing we didn't know is that the stick has to be plugged in to a wall outlet with an awkward cord. It makes the tv layout a little odd, but it works so we're happy.
author: Reviewer 1

review: Out of the box it was junk. trouble finding and keeping connected to router. I decided to order an HDMI extension and place it anywhere but behind the tv and it worked, no more streaming problems. What I ordered was "Aurum Ultra Series - High Speed HDMI Extension Cable Male - Female (6 feet) With Ethernet - Supports 3D and Audio Return Channel". I removed the stick from the 4" extension provided with the stick, connected the extension to that and the stick to the end of the extension. KAZAM!!!!!!!! Works like a champ.  Hope this helps.
author: Myra

review: I was worried this would be a really crappy and slow interface.  It actually works really well even over our wifi at home.  I thought for sure there would be image quality issues trying to stream wirelessly on a 50 inch TV, but they did something right and it's not an issue.  I don't even have any issues gaming while my wife is streaming.  This works exactly as promised with no issues at all.  My wife loves that she doesn't have to give up her shows while we use the Playstation downstairs anymore.
author: MikeB "Torres"
